```{r read_images}
#logos 
alarabiya <- image_read("images/alarabiya.PNG")
aljadeed <- image_read("images/aljadeed.PNG")
future_tv <- image_read("images/future_tv.PNG")
logo_list <- list(alarabiya, aljadeed, future_tv)

#cover_photos 
cover_photo <- image_read("images/coverphoto_alarabiya.PNG")
```



```{r}

logo_number <- sample(1:3, 1)

img <- c(cover_photo, logo_list[logo_number])

img <- image_append(image_scale(img, "x200"))

print(img)


```
